Topic.Title: THE WORLD ENDS TODAY, I THINK... (OFFICIAL RELEASE!) - Comedy Gamebook

Posts.EditableText:
**The World Ends Today, I Think...** is an absurdly long title for a gamebook.

You're waiting for the bus with your good ol' mate, **Jeb**. But he's chewing his popcorn **incredibly loudly**.
_And that's the last bit of normalcy you'll find in this game._

Jeb keeps on shooting you, the world keeps on ending, you keep having to restart, and you keep forgetting everything.

And it really pisses you off.

**Play the game right now!**
http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/pnmno4m7guu6zyjropbleg/the-world-ends-today-i-think

Have fun everyone!
-Diego Lucano

Posts.EditableText:
It's finally categorized as Comedy. We already have a good bunch'o players! Thanks for the positive reviews!

Next update should include fewer paragraphs per slide, added music, and SFX!
